Hi! Great Film. Very good print. my problem is that after burning the DVD I don't get the subs. WHat do I do?
Please help!

I havent dowloaded it yet...many DVD players support srt/txt format subtitles, if your filenames are the same (satantango1.avi & satantango1.srt)then your DVD player should display the sub properly. If you want to hardcode (in case your DVD player doesnt recognize the sub) the sub into the video stream use VirtualDub with TextSub filter then burn the AVI or convert it to DVD with VSO's ConvertXtoDVD(the fastest method). Find more info of subs at:doom9, afterdawn.
thanks! this film is just fantastic
